welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Holesov, the charming and historical city in Czechia! Get ready to immerse yourself in its rich culture, beautiful architecture, and delicious cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful stay and enjoy all that Holesov has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kunovice Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Prerov Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
